column1: build quality of wire is poor. after using this headset for 1 month, external wire is internally broked from one side of 3.5 mm jack now i can use this headphone only by bluetooth not through wire. otherwise headset is good.read more

bought it the second time because of good bass. but just after a month the audio jack socket got damaged by itself. it's not the first, but second time and the same problem. i don't suggest wasting money on this!read more
